Uses of Package
com.nokia.midp.examples.security.satsa

Classes in com.nokia.midp.examples.security.satsa used by com.nokia.midp.examples.security.satsa
Codec
          Codec handles the encryption, decryption and displays encrypted data in hex format.
DecryptScreen
          DecryptScreen provides a UI to enter decrption information and decrypted messages.
EncryptScreen
          EncryptScreen provides a UI to enter encryption information and encrypted messages.
InfoScreen
          An InfoScreen is a screen that shows errors to the user.
ListScreen
          ListScreen creates a menu list for the user to naviage to different screens.
MessageStore
          MessageStore manages all the message inventory in the RecordStore.
NewScreen
          NewScreen creates UI for user to enter the message and the password need to be encrypted.
PasswordScreen
          PasswordScreen allows the user to enter password to decrypt the message.
SATSAMIDlet
          SATSAMIDlet implements a simple set of security API defined in JSR 177.
